data.title: Unlocking the value of cookieless: A brand's guide to leveraging universal IDs
data.meta_description: Calling all brands! Download this guide to access the knowledge and tools you need to navigate the universal ID selection process
data.text:
Having a better understanding of the identity landscape is crucial for brands as they look to build out a solid addressability strategy. Between all the cookieless solutions available, universal identifiers (UIDs) have emerged as one of the most valuable alternatives to conventional identifiers.

However, with the proliferation of identifiers, it can be difficult to navigate the identity landscape. This guide aims to provide brands with the knowledge and tools needed to evaluate and adopt UIDS to make the most of the cookieless present and prepare for the future.

Download the guide to learn more.
